titleStmt.title: Restitution to the royal author, or, A Vindication of King Charls the Martyr's most excellent book intitutled 'Eikōn basilikē' from the false, scandalous, and malicious reflections lately published against it
titleStmt.author: Levett, William.
Keble, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing (2nd ed.) to Samuel Keble.
Contains letter, on p. 6-7, signed: William Levett.
This item appears as Wing Rll75 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) at reel 1155:32, and as Wing K121B at reel 1703:9.
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
